<Text: Royal Monceau Raffles Paris:  One of its restaurants has a Michelin star : "Il Carpaccio" serves Italian cuisine for lunch and dinner only and "Le Bar Long" serves lighter dishes all day from 8am to 2am with also a full bar available.>
